subject: Hello Dear
body:
Hello Dear
pjthorntonesq@gmail.com
I am Peter Joseph Thornton (Esq) a legal practitioner.
Do you have any profitable business in which we can invest the sum of fourteen million dollars within a period of 5 to 7 years? My client shares the same last name with you.
Your urgent response will be appreciated.
Regards,
P.J Thornton (Esq)
Direct Email: 
pjthorntonesq@gmail.com

subject: Re:    Hello Dear
body:
Hello Thornton Esq,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your offer, but I would like to know more details about the business opportunity before making any decisions. Could you please provide me with some additional information? What kind of business is it? How does it generate profit? And what are the potential risks involved?

I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Michael
